name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
description: While your Xiao has Yaksha's Mask attached, your use of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling will cost 1 less Anemo Die. (Every attachment of Yaksha's Mask allows the effect to be triggered twice)
descriptionraw: While your $[A1504] has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115041]</color> attached, your use of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S15042]</color> will cost 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Die</color>. (Every attachment of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115041]</color> allows the effect to be triggered twice)
